mosinstall.name: Search FireBoard
mosinstall.author: Handy PHP
mosinstall.description:
Allows Searching of FireBoard Component.
For support please see the Handy PHP Website.
If you find this Mambot useful, besure to comment at Joomla! Extensions Directory.
You may also make a donation with PayPal.

param.name: search_result_section_name
param.label: Search Result Section Name
param.description: Usually the name of your forum.

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of search items to return.

param.name: cat_search
param.label: Show Category Results
param.description: Show matching categories in the search results
param.option: No, do not show category matches.
Yes, show matching categories before message matches.
Yes, show matching categories after message matches.

param.name: allow_bbc
param.label: Allow BBC
param.description: Should Bulletin Board Code be allowed in the search results.
param.option: Yes, leave it in raw form.
No, remove the BBC and leave text only.

param.name: credit
param.label: Handy PHP Credit
param.description: Allow a search result to be shown for Handy PHP?
